lender.occupational_info:

I would also like to start a small design firm that help students find work while in school. Basically be a middle man (or women :)) between business who need design, and students who are hungry for work, but are fresh enough to have innovative ideas. And with my help, teach them how to interact with professionals.

My soon to go live portfolio site Red-Tie.net, will feature a Green-Tie section which will link to Kiva. A portion of all profits will go to a specific lender until the loan is filled. Clients will be encouraged to donate. It is my hope that I can make a difference in both the real and virtual world through my work.

lender.occupational_info: I help people using technology

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: it's what we should do to help our brothers and sisters.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: We are all on this rock together and we have to help each other through the tough spots.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: Every day I work with refugees who were forced to leave their countries and come to Canada due to violence, economic hardship, and political unrest. I feel it is so important to assist those who are able to remain safely in their home country and allow them to create and live a meaningful life.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to support women entrepreneurs and take my part to alleviate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make health care better, especially for children.

lender.name: John Trosko
lender.loan_because:
I am a small fish in a big pond. I know how difficult it is to g-r-o-w your business without working capital, even just a little here and there.
I've had the fortunate opportunity to have friends lend me money at different (and sometimes critical) stages of my business. Some were small loans, and some were large loans. It all adds up and I've repaid them and worked even harder than before.
For now, I am checking out Kiva to see how I can help. Looking to help people who want to be more productive and save time so their business can grow.
lender.occupational_info:
I am Los Angeles-based professional organizer, blogger, business owner and contributing author.
My consulting firm helps clients be better organized and more productive in their homes and businesses and manages relocations. Many of our clients have projects that they simply want done for them. An equal part of the business are folks who want the "skill" of organizing transfered to them. We teach these people how to make decisions, break projects down into small managable chunks and provide extraordinary motivation so they keep themselves on track.
I am a two-term president of the Los Angeles chapter of the National Association of Professional Organizers (NAPO-LA) and am also a member of the International Association for Private Service Professionals (IAPSP).
Born and raised in Princeton, New Jersey, I've been a resident of Los Angeles for nearly 15 years. I've got a background in creative organizational management, public relations and arts administration.

lender.name: Pete Gromadzinski
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much will be required. Luke 12:48

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Offering a loan offers hope. With hope anything can be accomplished.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: little things can make big changes in a person's life.

lender.name: Caz
lender.loan_because: It is an honour to share life's bounties. Just paying it forward, Life's been good to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in operations as a Lean SixSigma process design and improvement specialist (Lean SixSigma Black Belt).

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an humanitarian organisation. My role is help allocate funds to projects in developing countries.

lender.name: Ovetta
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle that we create our own opportunities and it's cool to help those who have a vision for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a seasoned writer and editor with more than 17 years experience in marketing and communications.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to gain access to high growth emerging markets.
lender.occupational_info: I fix or improve medium-to-large companies.

lender.name: William & Sherry
lender.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Surgical pain control and work with small, sick newborns.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I have heard about organizations like this, and microlending, for years. I always thought this was an incredible idea and am very happy to have found Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician and songwriter and I teach people of all ages to play the guitar.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: it is a way to directly reach someone halfway across the world.

lender.name: Patrick R.
lender.loan_because:
"A banker is someone who gives you an umbrella on a sunny day and demands it back when it starts raining."
The system is not designed to help people in developing countries, the internet is designed to do this and I just want to be part of this new era in banking.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist, I like to invent and conceive new ideas. I work in the medical device field but take an active interest in all aspects of science, life, art and philosophy.

lender.name: E. J. Mattos
lender.loan_because: I have money, sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: My work is somewhat tolerable.

lender.name: Justine and Megan
lender.occupation: mother of 7 & daughter, writer & athlete, students
lender.loan_because: We love people and cultures.

lender.name: Basirat
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I study child development and teach college students.

lender.name: BARBARA
lender.loan_because: I want to try to help people who are working very hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I take calls all day from people who can be happy, upset and sometimes angry.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Gift for my birthday from my wife.
lender.occupational_info: I search for books and periodicals that I think will be interesting to historians and other people doing historical research in the US from1492 - 1899.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people the chance to make their lives better.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: It feels good, and on a tight budget, a repaid loan lets me give again with the same dollar.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a holiday gift certificate for KIVA. I hope to re-use it many times and add to it in the future. It was a nice gesture of kindness from him and I would like that kindness passed along. I wish all my new KIVA friends good luck.
lender.occupational_info: I make bronze sculptures for public places and private collectors. The sculptures are at college campus's, city centers where people meet, churches, libraries and private homes. I have also sculpted a portrait of a Nobel scientist now working in malaria research. Let's hope he is successful.

lender.name: B.J.
lender.loan_because: We want to help real people in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional musician, my husband does autobody work.

lender.name: Kristen and family
lender.loan_because: It is written; Luke 6:38 - Give, and it shall be given unto you

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate as a Christmas gift and think it is an amazing idea. I am looking forward to learning more and helping others around the world fund their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company promoting and marketing fine wine and spirits. I also do the office administration duties and marketing for my fathers business, Fire & Ice Creations. He is an ice carver and makes beautiful sculptures for many types of events.

lender.name: Stevie
lender.loan_because: ...it's a small way to make a big difference. I like the idea of paying good fortune forward.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a computer help desk at a large insurance company.
